member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IFileAssociation
member.summary: Represents an association between a file type and a specific program.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IFileAssociation.DefaultIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets the default icon that is associated with files of this type.
member.returns: The default icon that is associated with files of this type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IFileAssociation.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the program that is used to open files of this type.
member.returns: The description of the program that is used to open files of this type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IFileAssociation.Extension
member.summary: Gets the file name extension for the file type.
member.returns: The file name extension for the file type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IFileAssociation.Progid
member.summary: Gets or sets the ProgID that identifies the program that is used to open files of this type.
member.returns: The ProgID that identifies the program that is used to open files of this type.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IFileAssociationCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of file type associations.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IFileAssociationCollection.Add(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a file association and adds it to the collection.
member.param: The file name extension for the file type.
The default icon that is associated with files of this type.
The description of the program used to open files of this type.
The ProgID that identifies the program used to open files of this type.
member.exception: is null or an invalid file name extension.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IFileAssociationCollection.Clear
member.summary: Removes all items from the collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IFileAssociationCollection.GetFileAssociations
member.summary: Returns the items in the collection as an array.
member.returns: The array of file associations.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IFileAssociationCollection.Item(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the file association for a specified file name extension.
member.returns: The file association for the file name extension; or null if the file name extension is not found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IFileAssociationCollection.Remove(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a file association from the collection.
member.param: The file name extension for the file type to remove.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishFile2
member.summary: Defines the ClickOnce properties of one file in a deployment on computers that have Visual Studio 2008 Service Pack 1 or later versions.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishFile2.Group
member.summary: Gets or sets the download group for this file.
member.returns: The download group for this file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishFile2.IncludeHash
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the hash of the file in the output manifest.
member.returns: true if the hash of the file is included in the output manifest; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishFile2.IsAssembly
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the file is an assembly.
member.returns: true if the file is an assembly; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishFile2.IsDataFile
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the file is a data file.
member.returns: true if the file is a data file; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishFile2.IsOrphaned
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the file cannot be mapped to a file in the project.
member.returns: true if the file cannot be mapped to a file in the project; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishFile2.IsPrerequisite
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the file is a prerequisite for the deployment.
member.returns: true if the file is a prerequisite for the deployment; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishFile2.IsPublished
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the file will be deployed.
member.returns: true if the file will be deployed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishFile2.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the file is required.
member.returns: true if the file is required; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishFile2.Name
member.summary: Gets the local name of the file.
member.returns: The local name of the file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishFile2.PublishStatus
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates how a file should be treated by the build system.
member.returns: A value that indicates how a file should be treated by the build system.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishFile2.Reset
member.summary: Sets file properties to their default values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishFile2.TargetPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the target name of the file.
member.returns: The target name of the file.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2
member.summary: Defines the ClickOnce properties of a published application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.ApplicationRevision
member.summary: Gets or sets the revision number of the application.
member.returns: The revision number of the application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.ApplicationVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.AutorunEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to create an autorun.ini file for this application.
member.returns: true if an autorun.ini file should be created for this application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.BootstrapperComponentsLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the way the bootstrapper should download components.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.BootstrapperDownloadUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL from which to download bootstrapper components of this application.
member.returns: The URL from which to download bootstrapper components of this application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.BootstrapperEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the bootstrapper should be generated.
member.returns: true if the bootstrapper should be generated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.BootstrapperPackages
member.summary: Gets the collection of bootstrapper packages.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.CreateWebPageOnPublish
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to generate a Web page when this application is published.
member.returns: true if a Web page should be created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.DisallowUrlActivation
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to run the application after installation
member.returns: true if the application should be started after installation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.Install
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to install the application on the user's machine.
member.returns: true to install the application on the user's machine.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.InstallFrom
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of install location.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.InstallUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL from which the user should install the application.
member.returns: The URL from which the user should install the application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.MapFileExtensions
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to add ".deploy" as an extension to all deployed files.
member.returns: true to add ".deploy" as an extension to all deployed files.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.MinimumRequiredVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum version users can install.
member.returns: The minimum version users can install.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.OpenBrowserOnPublish
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to open the default browser after each publish.
member.returns: true to open the default browser every time the application is published.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.ProductName
member.summary: Gets and sets the name of the application.
member.returns: The name of the application that will be displayed on the installation program.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.PublisherName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the publisher.
member.returns: The name of the publisher that will be displayed in the installation program.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.PublishFiles
member.summary: Gets a collection of files that can be deployed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.PublishUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL to which the application will be deployed.
member.returns: The URL to which the application will be deployed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.SupportUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL to which users can go for support.
member.returns: The URL to which users can go for support.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.TargetCulture
member.summary: Gets or sets the culture for which the deployment will be generated.
member.returns: The culture for which the deployment will be generated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.TrustUrlParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to allow users to pass parameters to the application via the URL.
member.returns: true to allow users to pass parameters to the application via the URL.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.UpdateEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether users are allowed to update their application.
member.returns: true if users are allowed to update their application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.UpdateInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of units for the application to wait before checking for updates.
member.returns: The number of units for the application to wait before checking for updates.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.UpdateIntervalUnits
member.summary: Gets or sets the units of time for the application to wait before checking for updates.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.UpdateMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode by which the application will check for updates.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.UpdatePeriodically
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the application should check for updates.
member.returns: true if the application should check for updates.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.UpdateRequired
member.summary: Gets or sets whether update is required.
member.returns: true if update is required.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.UpdateUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL to use to check for future updates.
member.returns: The URL to use to check for future updates.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.UseApplicationTrust
member.summary: Gets or sets if manifest trust info as well as publisher and product information is added to the application manifest
member.returns: true if trust information is added to the manifest.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.VerifyUploadedFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the uploaded files will be validated after publish.
member.returns: true if uploaded files will be validated after publish.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties2.WebPageFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the web page that should be created or opened on publish.
member.returns: The name of the web page that should be created or opened on publish.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3
member.summary: Defines the ClickOnce properties of a published application on computers that have Visual Studio 2008 Service Pack 1 or later versions.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.ApplicationRevision
member.summary: Gets or sets the revision number of the publish version of the application.
member.returns: The revision number of the publish version of the application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.ApplicationVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the publish version of the application.
member.returns: The publish version of the application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.AutorunEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to create an autorun.inf file for this application.
member.returns: true to create an autorun.inf file for this application; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.BootstrapperComponentsLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets how the bootstrapping application will download components.
member.returns: One of the values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.BootstrapperDownloadUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the uniform resource identifier (URI) from which to download the bootstrapping application components of this application.
member.returns: The URI from which to download the bootstrapping application components of this application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.BootstrapperEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to generate the bootstrapping application.
member.returns: true to generate the bootstrapping application; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.BootstrapperPackages
member.summary: Gets the collection of packages for the bootstrapping application.
member.returns: The collection of packages for the bootstrapping application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.CreateDesktopShortcut
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the installer adds a shortcut to the desktop.
member.returns: true if the installer adds a shortcut to the desktop; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.CreateWebPageOnPublish
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Visual Studio generates a Web page for the application when the application is published.
member.returns: true if Visual Studio generates a Web page for the application; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.DisallowUrlActivation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to prevent an installed application from starting when the deployment uniform resource identifier (URI) is visited.
member.returns: true to prevent an installed application from starting when the deployment URI is visited; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.ErrorReportUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the uniform resource identifier (URI) to which the installer will post information if the application installation fails.
member.returns: The URI to which the installer will post information if the application installation fails.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.ExcludeDeploymentUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a deployment uniform resource identifier (URI) is included in the application manifest.
member.returns: true if a deployment URI is included in the application manifest; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.FileAssociations
member.summary: Gets the collection of file associations for this application.
member.returns: The collection of file associations for this application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.Install
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the installer will install the application.
member.returns: true if the installer installs the application; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.InstallFrom
member.summary: Gets or sets the kind of location from which the application is installed.
member.returns: One of the values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.InstallUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the uniform resource identifier (URI) from which the user will install the application.
member.returns: The URI from which the user will install the application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.MapFileExtensions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to add the .deploy file name extension to all deployed files.
member.returns: true to add the .deploy file name extension to all deployed files; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.MinimumRequiredVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum required version for this application for this deployment.
member.returns: The minimum required version for this application for this deployment.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.OpenBrowserOnPublish
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Visual Studio opens the default browser when the application is published.
member.returns: true if Visual Studio opens the default browser when the application is published; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.ProductName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the application.
member.returns: The name of the application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.PublisherName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the publisher.
member.returns: The name of the publisher.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.PublishFiles
member.summary: Gets the collection of files in the project.
member.returns: The collection of files in the project.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.PublishUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the uniform resource identifier (URI) to which the application is published.
member.returns: The URI to which the application is published.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.SuiteName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the product suite of which the application is a part.
member.returns: The name of the product suite of which the application is a part.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.SupportUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the uniform resource identifier (URI) for support for the application.
member.returns: The URI for support for the application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.TargetCulture
member.summary: Gets or sets the publish language Visual Studio uses to publish the application.
member.returns: The publish language of the application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.TrustUrlParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to allow uniform resource identifier (URI) parameters to be passed to application.
member.returns: true to allow URI parameters to be passed to application; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.UpdateEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can update the application.
member.returns: true to let users update the application; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets how long the application waits before it checks for updates.
member.returns: How long the application waits before it checks for updates, in units defined by the property.

member.summary: Gets or sets the units of time of the property.
member.returns: One of the values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.UpdateMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the strategy that the application uses to check for available updates.
member.returns: One of the values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.UpdatePeriodically
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the application checks for updates.
member.returns: true if the application checks for updates; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.UpdateRequired
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this version represents a required update.
member.returns: ture if this version represents a required update; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.UpdateUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the uniform resource identifier (URI) for updates for the application.
member.returns: The URI for updates for the application.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.ManagedInterfaces.Publish.IPublishProperties3.UseApplicationTrust
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether manifest trust information, in addition to publisher and product information, is added to the application manifest.
member.returns: true to add manifest trust information to the application manifest; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Visual Studio verifies the uploaded files after they are published.
member.returns: true if Visual Studio verifies the uploaded files after they are published; otherwise, false.
